com.vangav.backend.networks.rest_client

Class RestRequestGetQuery

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.vangav.backend.networks.rest_client.RestRequestGetQuery

  • public class RestRequestGetQuery
extends java.lang.Object
    GetQuery represents GET REST call's query (e.g.: id=123&name=john)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RestRequestGetQuery()
      Constructor GetQuery
      RestRequestGetQuery(java.lang.String key, java.lang.String value)
      Constructor GetQuery constructs params map and adds key/value to it useful as a shortcut for one-key-value GET queries
